nodes.text: Unidentified B1 battle droid lieutenant  (Opop Hibbedit)

A B1-series battle droid served as a lieutenant in a squad within the droid army of the Confederacy of Independent Systems. The squad was sent to survey the astronomical object Opop Hibbedit, where the battle droid lieutenant reported to a T-series military strategic analysis and tactics droid. While the squad was in transit aboard a Multi-Troop Transport, the battle droid Q5-7070 fell out due to faulty fasteners. By the time that the squad surveyed a new area of Opop Hibbedit, Q5-7070 returned, and the lieutenant chastised him. Q5-7070 attempted to report his faulty moorings to the lieutenant, who ordered him aboard their transport. The fasteners remained unfixed, causing Q5-7070 to fall out again once the transport began moving.
